place_of_publication.publication_title: Mem. Coll. Sci. Kyo to Imp. Univ., Ser. B, Biol.

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 具芒灰帽薹草 ju mang hui mao tai cao

treatment.description: Male spike oblong-linear, shorter than that of typical variety. Female glumes shortly awned at apex. Fl. and fr. Apr–May.
treatment.distribution: Grasslands on mountain slopes; ca. 1600 m. Anhui, Hubei, Jiangsu, Sichuan, Taiwan, Zhejiang [Japan].
